languages.text: "Мы сможем узнать больше, если отыщем конструкт, сотворенный по приказу Фабрикатор-Цензора... координаты есть — он находится здесь же, в недрах мануфакторума". {n}Хейнрикс бросает последний взгляд на лексмеханика, навечно замершего в цикле бессмысленного действия, и отворачивается.{/n} "Нам лучше поторопиться".

"We can learn more if we find the construct that was created on the Fabricator-Censor's orders... The coordinates are here. It is located here, in the bowels of the manufactorum." {n}Heinrix casts a final look at the Lexmechanic, now locked forever in a cycle of mindless motion, and turns away.{/n} "We had better hurry."
languages.original_text: "Мы сможем узнать больше, если отыщем конструкт, сотворенный по приказу Фабрикатор-Цензора... координаты есть — он находится здесь же, в недрах мануфакторума". {n}Хейнрикс бросает последний взгляд на лексмеханика, навечно замершего в цикле бессмысленного действия, и отворачивается.{/n} "Нам лучше поторопиться".

It is located here, in the bowels of the manufactorum." {n}Heinrix casts a final look at the Lexmechanic, now locked forever in a cycle of mindless motion, and turns away.{/n} "We had better hurry."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果能找到铸造审查师下令制造的造物的话，就可以得到更多情报……这是坐标，那台机器就在这里，在制造工厂内部。”{n}海因里希看了那位思律机僧最后一眼，随后便转过了身。思律机僧如今永远被困在了无意识的循环运动之中。{/n}“我们得赶紧动身了。”
languages.original_text: "We can learn more if we find the construct that was created on the Fabricator-Censor's orders... The coordinates are here. It is located here, in the bowels of the manufactorum." {n}Heinrix casts a final look at the Lexmechanic, now locked forever in a cycle of mindless motion, and turns away.{/n} "We had better hurry."

traits.locale_text: “如果能找到铸造审查师下令制造的造物的话，就可以得到更多情报……这是坐标，那台机器就在这里，在制造工厂内部。”{n}海因里希看了那位法律技工最后一眼，随后便转过了身。法律技工如今永远被困在了无意识的循环运动之中。{/n}“我们得赶紧动身了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Podremos descubrir más información si encontramos el constructo que se creó por orden del fabricator-censor... Estas son las coordenadas. Está aquí, en las entrañas del manufactorum». {n}Heinrix dedica una última mirada al lexmecánico, ahora atrapado en un ciclo eterno de movimiento indolente, y le da la espalda.{/n} «Será mejor que nos apresuremos».
languages.original_text: "We can learn more if we find the construct that was created on the Fabricator-Censor's orders... The coordinates are here. It is located here, in the bowels of the manufactorum." {n}Heinrix casts a final look at the Lexmechanic, now locked forever in a cycle of mindless motion, and turns away.{/n} "We had better hurry."

traits.locale_text: «Podremos descubrir más información si encontramos el constructo que se creó por orden del fabricator-censor... Estas son las coordenadas. Está aquí, en las entrañas del manufactorum». {n}Heinrix dedica una última mirada al lexmecánico, ahora atrapado en un ciclo eterno de movimiento indolente, y le da la espalda.{/n} «Será mejor que nos apresuremos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ファブリケーター・センサーの命令で作られた構造物を見つければ、もっと詳しいことがわかるかもしれません…座標はここ、聖工場の地下のようです」{n}ハインリックスは、今や心なき永遠のサイクルの中へ閉じ込められた法技術者に最後の視線を投げかけ、背を向けた。{/n}「急いだほうがいいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We can learn more if we find the construct that was created on the Fabricator-Censor's orders... The coordinates are here. It is located here, in the bowels of the manufactorum." {n}Heinrix casts a final look at the Lexmechanic, now locked forever in a cycle of mindless motion, and turns away.{/n} "We had better hurry."

traits.locale_text: 「ファブリケーター・センサーの命令で作られた構造物を見つければ、もっと詳しいことがわかるかもしれません…座標はここ、聖工場の地下のようです」{n}ハインリックスは、今や心なき永遠のサイクルの中へ閉じ込められた法技術者に最後の視線を投げかけ、背を向けた。{/n}「急いだほうがいいでしょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wir können mehr darüber erfahren, wenn wir das Konstrukt finden, das auf Befehl des Fabricator-Zensors hergestellt wurde ... Wir haben die Koordinaten. Es befindet sich hier, in den Eingeweiden des Manufactorums." {n}Heinrix wirft einen letzten Blick auf den Lexmechanicus, der nun für immer in einem Zyklus hirnloser Bewegung gefangen ist, und wendet sich ab.{/n} "Wir sollten uns beeilen."
languages.original_text: "We can learn more if we find the construct that was created on the Fabricator-Censor's orders... The coordinates are here. It is located here, in the bowels of the manufactorum." {n}Heinrix casts a final look at the Lexmechanic, now locked forever in a cycle of mindless motion, and turns away.{/n} "We had better hurry."

traits.locale_text: "Wir können mehr darüber erfahren, wenn wir das Konstrukt finden, das auf Befehl des Fabricator-Zensors hergestellt wurde ... Wir haben die Koordinaten. Es befindet sich hier, in den Eingeweiden des Manufactorums." {n}Heinrix wirft einen letzten Blick auf den Lexmechanicus, der nun für immer in einem Zyklus hirnloser Bewegung gefangen ist, und wendet sich ab.{/n} "Wir sollten uns beeilen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Nous pourrons en apprendre davantage si nous trouvons la machine dont le fabricator-censeur a ordonné la création... Voici les coordonnées. Elle est ici, dans les entrailles du manufactorum. » {n}Heinrix lance un dernier regard au lexmécanicien, désormais prisonnier d'un cycle perpétuel de gestes mécaniques, et se détourne.{/n} « Dépêchons-nous. »
languages.original_text: "We can learn more if we find the construct that was created on the Fabricator-Censor's orders... The coordinates are here. It is located here, in the bowels of the manufactorum." {n}Heinrix casts a final look at the Lexmechanic, now locked forever in a cycle of mindless motion, and turns away.{/n} "We had better hurry."

traits.locale_text: « Nous pourrons en apprendre davantage si nous trouvons la machine dont le fabricator-censeur a ordonné la création... Voici les coordonnées. Elle est ici, dans les entrailles du manufactorum. » {n}Heinrix lance un dernier regard au lexmécanicien, désormais prisonnier d'un cycle perpétuel de gestes mécaniques, et se détourne.{/n} « Dépêchons-nous. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün emriyle kurulan yapıyı bulabilirsek daha çok bilgi edinebiliriz... Koordinatlar burada. Tam burada, manufaktorumun içlerinde yer alıyor." {n}Heinrix, ebedî bir harekete mahkûm edilmiş Lexmekanik'e son bir bakış atıp sırtını dönüyor.{/n} "Acele etsek iyi olur."
languages.original_text: "We can learn more if we find the construct that was created on the Fabricator-Censor's orders... The coordinates are here. It is located here, in the bowels of the manufactorum." {n}Heinrix casts a final look at the Lexmechanic, now locked forever in a cycle of mindless motion, and turns away.{/n} "We had better hurry."

traits.locale_text: "Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün emriyle kurulan yapıyı bulabilirsek daha çok bilgi edinebiliriz... Koordinatlar burada. Tam burada, manufaktorumun içlerinde yer alıyor." {n}Heinrix, ebedî bir harekete mahkûm edilmiş Lexmekanik'e son bir bakış atıp sırtını dönüyor.{/n} "Acele etsek iyi olur."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
